communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Employee discipline records for Desmond A. Freeling. Records pertaining to promotions, demotions, and/or changes to work schedule for Desmond A. Freeling. Records pertaining to correspondence about behavior/discipline of Desmond A. Freeling.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

David Locke

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Open Records Request
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Copies of all invoices submitted by the Atlanta Police Foundation or containing the keyword "Atlanta Police Foundation" between the dates of January 1, 2018 and March 5, 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

e

communications.subject: RE: [EXTERNAL] Georgia Open Records Act Request: Open Records Request
communications.communication:
Greetings,
You have contacted the City of Atlanta, Department of Procurement.  Please be advised that the Department of Procurement (DOP) does not have documents in its custody and control that are responsive to your request, therefore, there are no documents to make available to you through the DOP.
In addition, we would suggest you contact the Department of Finance, Accounts Payable at: OpenRecords-Finance@AtlantaGA.gov<mailto:OpenRecords-Finance@AtlantaGA.gov> to determine if they possess the information you seek.
Please let me know if you have any questions.

[cid:image001.png@01D9510E.F3BD1EF0]
